content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 very bright lights that light-up the sky and my entire back yard around 5am this morning.   i cannot find any media reports about the l;ights in the area.
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of what seemed to look like crop circles on top of a lake with snow on it. to my memory there was no ice or snow the night before. i could tell the ice was very thin for anyone to be on the ice. isaw a dense fog rolled in on top of the lake so dense that i cannot take pictures of the lake  and minutes later i returned to see that all of the circles and snow melted in the fog was gone.I was in my apartment at the time. i first noticed when i looked out of my back patio window. when i first saw it i thought it was warm water coming from pipelines that was melting the snow in straight lines until i saw all that the lines did not coincide with the pipes going to the lake.They were also circles in various spots around the lines in it.Because of the lake was so big i had to get a higher vantage point to take pictures and it took me several pictures to make a panoramic view of it. seeing the fog rolling in remind me of the movie the fog on how it came in and vanished. it was frightening. i even feel anxious about wrighting about it now.The first and last time i try to contact someone about these pictures and sent it to them i got no reply the pictures were erased from my computer.I did not erase these pictures. i still have these pictures . value them very much and if you would like to see them contact me i don't want to take the risk of my smartphone mysteriously breaking down.Tank you for your time.
content.summary: A cloud like fog very thick

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to store to do some grocery shopping when i witnessed the craft. i was alone and had my headphones on so i cannot say whether it made sound before i noticed it but when i did see the object i quickly removed my headphones and had enough time to take one picture before it zoomed off.

it was a rainy day with a lot of cloud cover, there was no birds or planes in the area. i did not see any blinking lights and the object didn't appear to have any identifiable markings. it appeared to be smooth and windowless. it was round/oval with a "tail". i am not sure what it was. it didn't look like a plane i have seen. it was roundish with a tail, that is all i can say to explain it. the object didn't move as i viewed it for about 3 minutes before it left my line of sight. it flew in a straight path after it hovered for about 30-60 seconds. time went by really fast and afterwards my heart was pounding. i showed a few friends and they told i my have something but they have no idea what it is either. maybe i can get some answers here.

(loaction coquitlam bc, canada. lougheed hwy.)
content.summary: Witnessed ufo walking down the road

content.detailedDescription:
Well where do i start. i will be detailed but brief since i could practically write a book regarding what i have experienced since the year 1995.  there were incidents before, one being an experience with a ufo in the late 70's at mt rainier national park.. i actually reported this incident to this same website a few years ago.  now i realize their were situations prior to this that started in the 60's but in the state of maine.  
but let me get back to the 1995 incident. there were actually two incidents within a few months of each other but it is the 2nd incident which forever changed how i see what we define as reality.  
it began as any other day but changed approximately around 10 pm.  i was in my bedroom just talking with my now husband.  i was sitting on the bed and my husband was sitting in raised closed, (a closet with large drawers underneath so that you can sit on the bottom of the closet when opened).  all of a sudden everything seemed to freeze in time and i experienced what i considered to be a direct communication with some type of entity of unknown origin. the communication was all consuming yet i could see my husband sitting slightly slumped over with his hands now covering his face yet seemingly outside of my experience.  the communication came hard and very fast, i remember saying over and over again "wow and slow down"  the communication was so overwhelming fast, similar to like a computer download.  i have no memory of how much time transpired, nor what happened afterwards. my next clear memory was awakening in the morning. my first statement was "everything looks the same but something is different". then i was overcome by my senses to the point of anxiety and fear.  i saw how everything is connected, patterns in nature, representations, etc. i was physically shaking and so overwhelmed, this is when i asked my husband what he remembered about what i thought was last night. he remembers hearing me say wow and slow down over and over again but nothing else except awakening in the morning next to me. 
i wont go into all the details as to other unexplained events, but here is just one sample.  there was a brand new large projection tv in the living room which my stepfather had received for christmas.  one evening i awoke and was compelled to go into the living room to see the tv on close caption with a blue screen it had a 4 line mathematical equation with some symbols that i have never seen before. i remember just standing there studying it trying to memorize it.  i thought write it down but before i made my first step to do so my stepfather entered the room and asked me what i was doing and when he saw what was on the tv he promptly turned it off. i again saw the equation at a friends house conveyed in the same way. both televisions were on cable at the time. weird stuff just happens, so lets fast forward. mathematics is the language of the universe.  i have been working on what we currently refer to as the theory of everything but from a totally unconventional direction. having some success but my problem is i need a physicist, i have been self teaching myself with varying degrees of success but i can see it reflected in language, patterns and connections.  so i need a physicist to help convert it to a actual equation.  also i would like to know if anyone else had ever experienced anything similar.  well thanks for your time hope to hear from you, susan
content.summary: Direct communication

content.detailedDescription: I was making a turn onto my houses street with my friend in his truck. we were about to make a left turn and i look up and there was this bright green glowing orb that appeared to be basketball size just hovering in the air. as soon as i had my eyes on it for about 20 seconds the craft sprang to life and proceeded south east from about zero to easily over 600 mph leaving a glowing tail similar to that i have seen on a shooting star. it was like the light was being bent and stretched due to its acceleration. it made no noise during the acceleration at all. the orb itself was so bright that it was hard to miss. it almost made the sky seem to glow. it made my heart stop. i was terrified and awestruck at the same time. my friend who was in the truck with me and is a 911 operator sent me a message this morning telling me we were not the only ones who witnessed the lights last night and that the craft was also reportedly spotted in pompton lakes nj roughly 8 miles from my siting in ramsey nj.
content.summary: Glowing pulsating green orb. powerful aura and strong glow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in mission b.C. canada, i was on my way to work driving down the highway. i had music going so i did not hear anything approach i am also unclear as too how long the object was in the area. when i noticed the object i pulled over snapped one shot before it took off. it took me sometime to get myself together while this was happening. i wasn't nervous or anything like that it was more of an un ability to do anything. time seemed to sit still and when i got to my phone i could only take the one picture. 

it never flew away it was just there and then gone. i can't explain it and i am still freaked out by the whole thing and it is a day later. 

i had a witness with me, we were both on our way to work at the same place. it was our regular day and regular route of travel. 

i hope someone can help us out with this.
content.summary: Ufo seen on way into work

content.detailedDescription: Was at my friends house and we saw lights but heard no noise to go with the lights. so i went outside and saw whats in the picture below. it was glowing and huge! it hovered for about 5 mins and just vanished.
content.summary: Came and just kinda hoverd over building

content.detailedDescription:
This description is being filed for the witness by david kreiter, field investigator.
  the witness reported that when he was about thee years old his bedroom filled with a blue light late at night.  he awoke and went to the window where he observed a disc-like craft and three entities standing beside it.  when he looked out the window he felt as if they saw him. he then went running to his father's room.  he was terrified.  the father and son returned to the bedroom and the father looked out of the window but the craft and the entities were gone.
content.summary: Witness saw craft and three entities in his yard when he was three years old

content.detailedDescription: I was walking west to my house i saw three amber flying objects coming from the south. i knew right away this was not a normal aircraft formation i ran and called my son to witness the event he only one of the first set. my wife also heard me and came running out. then we all saw the next set of three in straight line formation coming. they also turned west at90 degree turn and turned red and disappeared into the horizon very fast. they did not flash and glowed in a solid color until they turned west then turned red and glowed and moved very fast. this is real world event. they were not aircraft.
content.summary: From south in amber color turn west red color high speed no sound no flashing.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from orangeburg,sc to denmark,sc in april of 1992 not sure o f the day or that particular road.I think it was route 70 or 75 or 77 and it was about 7:00 pm to 7:30 pm and it was dusk in the horizon. i came to a slight hill going down ward and i looked straight up ward in the sky and notice a black oval shape object in the sky. the object looked like it was far from me a large distance but as i started down the hill coming to a four way road not sure of the crossing road.But there was a old white little building looked like a closed gas station on my right side.The black oval object seemed like it was getting closer and closer. now, there was still light on the horizon and before i new it the black oval shape object was hovering over my car in perfect silence. i looked for other cars coming in front and in the rear but i was the only car on the road at that time which i considered very odd during that time of day. as, i slowed my car down to about 3 to 5 miles per hour i stuck my head out the car to get a real good look at this strange object. i notice that the object did not make a sound plus it had 6 rows of pulsating lights like a whitish,orange,red color.Then when i thought to my self at time this must be a ufo i lost some time because all i remember that i was driving looking back and the black object was still in my rear moving real slow to my left. then when i got to my destination i realized that it was around 9:15 pm and trip should only taken 25 minutes and i cannot recall the time loss.
content.summary: All black oval shape,6 rows of cascading lights red,yellow, orange, no engine sound,

content.detailedDescription: as i was driving home and nearing my house i saw a very large red orb in the sky. it was larger than the moon so it easily caught my attention. it hovered in place for a few seconds then descended a few hundred feet into the treeline. at first i thought the object was a plane but it was to round and bright. right after i saw it i ran inside to get my friend in hopes to see it as only a few seconds had passed. we ran back outside to the same spot on the road where i saw it however it was not there. i have never seen anything like this in my life!
content.summary: Large red orb decends behind trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my parents in texas in june 2013, i was up late that night. i had forgot something in my car. when i went outside i noticed a unusual bright white light that seem to be pulsating. i went and got my samsung tab 2 and began filming, honestly i was a little aggravated because it seemed so small looking at the recording. i thought i saw another one come out of no where and i, and it was gone. there was no sound but just a car passing by on the highway. 
it was not until i downloaded it on 2/8/2014 on my desk top computer to my surprise another object was emitting the red flashing, pulsating lights. it looked brown at first but after enhancing the brightness on a copy i made, it was surreal.  then i noticed when i was watching the video the other one i had saw but it seemed to be coming off of the craft or whatever that was. and confusing to me is that in different viewing programs it was in  a different angle, so i am trying to figure out if its upside down. i did not have a way to rotate it. so please feel free to figure that out. the copy i made with the enhanced brightness was wow, all i know is had i known this was hanging around outside our neighborhood, i probably wouldn't have this footage. to know i was this close terrifies me because trust me the camera on a samsung tab 2 has limited capabilities, so i have this feeling it was pretty close.
content.summary: Ufo se texas

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 11 pm as i heard my cat crying outside.  i thought my dog escaped somehow and was playing around with him.  i checked and looked out of the glass backdoor.  then that's when i suddenly noticed these two very bright white lights that were parallel with each other which made me think that this thing was an object.  it was between two trees that had a good gap between each other which gave me a good view of the object coming toward me.  at first i thought this thing was just a regular airliner since our area is active with them, but it was not as high as them plus it was at tree level.  i also realized that these two lights were remaining constant and did not blink at all, the object was also going really slow.  i was startled at what i was seeing. the object suddenly turned itself to my left to go in a new direction and now i was seeing the side of it but the two lights in front of the aircraft were still visible. i then went out to the back deck to get a closer look since this object was now behind a line of trees in my backyard, but i could still see the object through them since the two lights were very bright. i hurried back into my house to grab my jacket being that it was about 20 degrees outside. it only took me about 3 seconds to get back outside. but i could no longer see the lights through the trees. i was still convinced that this thing was still there since it was going really slow and because i have a very big backyard. i hurried quickly to my neighbor's backyard that was behind the trees where this thing was flying over. it was gone, i was very disappointed being that this was my first ever sighting of a ufo. i have no idea how it disappeared so fast since it was going very slow. it either disappeared into thin air or it flew off very fast.
content.summary: I saw these two bright lights in my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside and up the road.  i was standing on the sidewalk and looking at the stars forming in the sky.  soon a star(or what i thought to be a star) fell straight down.  it was like it was dropping from the sky.  a few seconds later another one appeared in the same spot, and dropped down at the same rate.  it happened a few more times. i had watched a geminid meteor shower over the summer.  they shot across the sky.  these things just fell straight down.  no trail.  no line, or changing luminescence.  just a star dropping to the ground.  they disappeared after the horizon so i assumed they landed.

moments later my niece and nephews arrived with my sister.  my sister said they witness the exact same thing from across the city.  i really was in awe.  i have seen planes get struck by the sun and light up when flying.  i have even seen ufos followed by air force jets.  but this was strange.  they fell straight down.
content.summary: 3 or 4 spherical lights fell straight down. they all appeared form the same position in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: It appeared in front of window. we got scared. looked at it looking back at us,my girl got scared, i said it was a fairy,she screamed,it flew away and also looked scared. we both drew what it looked like and both drawings were exactly the same,almost. almost identicle.
content.summary: Saw a human insect like alien with my girlfriend. we both saw it

content.detailedDescription: It was dusk, at about 18:21 pm cst, and i was cleaning my outside firepit when i saw a solid bright white light moving slowly from the nw to the se. i observed that it was moving in a straight line. at arms length it was the size of an aspirin.  it appeared to be very high in the sky. i ran inside and grabbed my cell phone and went back outside and re-engaged the object visually. i tried to call a friend but he did not answer.  i then ran out into the road and tried to wave down vehicles with the light of my cell phone. some vehicles slowed down and i was pointing up so they might see what i saw. but no one stopped. i did see a red truck stop a short distance past my house and it looked like the driver got out and was watching the sky.  i did not speak to this person. i then called my mom and spoke to her diring the rest of the sighting. the object continued to move slowly towards the se.  it never changed in size, nor did it make any sharp movements.  it eventually just faded out of my sight.
content.summary: I was cleaning my outside firepit when i saw a solid bright white light moving slowly from the nw to the se.

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my garage and had my shirt off. i stepped out of the garage for a moment and saw a bright light. it looked like a giant led light. it moved from the west to the east.  it had no form, no other lights or colors, and made no sound.  at one point it was directly over my head. at arms length it was the size of a frisbee. when it was overhead i was being swooped by bats.  so i ran inside and grabbed my shirt and put it on. by the time i got back outside the object was gone. it was a clear night and i could see as far as the eye in all directions. actually it was at late dusk.  the night sky was out with a little sun showing on the horizon.
content.summary: Saw a bright white light at arms length frisbee size. moved directly over me. no sound.  no form.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway leaning up against my car looking at the clouds over waycross when out all of a sudden i saw a bright white and red light appear. at first i thought it was a helicopter but when i saw that they didn't have the flashing lights or nor did it make a sound. (in this part of georgia when its 9:30pm you can hear a car drive by on the freeway from 5 miles away) so when i did not hear a single sound i was starting to wonder what it was. when it made a sudden direction change i knew this was not a helicopter or an airplane. i watched in amazement as the object appeared to gain altitude and proceeded to get my grandmother to witness the event with me. we stood outside on our back deck as we watched the lights get smaller intel the object stopped and hovered in the sky for about 8-10 seconds be for the red and white light started to flash randomly for about 3 seconds be for they stopped and the object just disappeared.
content.summary: It appeared over in the low lowed cover moving se.

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a very bright star. movingfrom west to east. very sharp direction changes. the longer i watched  it the faster it got still changing direction.From the horizon to pasing my house took about two minutes.
content.summary: Bright star like moving very fast & changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house out back, at around 12 , star gazing, one winter

there was what looked like to a meteor shower but the light was violet, witch got my attention pretty quick. so i decided to bask in the the illness of a spectacular even, 

well it got my attention, with the light and then, once i was fully focused on what seemed to be a meteor shower, or silent violet fireworks then a huge space craft filled the my field of vision, it was obviously something form out of this world. 

i saw the meteor "shower" on the corner of my eye, walked out from under my deck to get a better view, then a huge ship covered my field of vision, that seemed to be rectangular with rounded edges looking kind of like a gigantic touch screen smart phone,face down with stop sign shaped light screens\ panels underneath, witch seem to be propelling it somehow, so i was standing there observing. at first the ufo started out slow, then got faster and faster, as it moved on, the lights were passing over head and seemed to be constant light, until about half way then it started to pulse faster and faster, then was gone. the ship was hovering in a straight path, when it started to accelerate, then the lights started to flash at different intervals, which in my observation seemed to control the general direction of the ship. was silent. 

when i saw the light i was curious, when i saw the ship i for some reason couldn't move, when the ship left i just stood outside in below zero temperature with goose bumps, contemplating what i just saw. then i snapped out of it i thought i was having psychological issues so i took my medication, no more than ten minutes latter i go outside again and the sky is filled with military planes and helicopters, they were flying around securing the airspace. i was star struck. 

it hovered away.
content.summary: I was pointing a violet laser at stars, and adjusting the focus, while speaking into the beam.

content.detailedDescription:
january 29th,2014, i went outside & took photos of the sunset -- we definitely have more colorful sunsets than this one, so not sure why i wanted to take these photos.  used my newer droid cell phone -- took a few photos, deleted some & kept 2 -- really didn't look closely at the pictures at this time.  

last night, 2-6-14, my granddaughter texted a photo of snow in the headlights of their car, saying how cold it was on their way north to our cabin -- i sent her back the two photos of the sunset to show the difference in the temperatures.  this was when i really "looked" at the photos and was shocked at what i was looking at -- i look at the sky often & never see anything (ufo's) ------ my camera "saw" the objects ------ i didn't see anything while taking the photos, except the sunset -- as i wasn't looking for objects in the sky.  i would have thought i would have noticed -- but, did not.  

not only was i shocked to see the objects, but the fact that there were saucer shaped objects -- and the cylinder object also -- thought that was unusual -- ??

my son convinced me that i should send the photos somewhere to get a possible opinion regarding the photos.  so -- sending one to mufon -- thanks!
content.summary: After taking pictures of sunset -- later noticed a saucer/1 large/3 small, & a cylinder object in photos.

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm summer evening when 2 friends and i,a couple i lived with at that address, were looking up and west watching a klm747 climbing south over lake ontario. that location is directly south of pearson international airport about a half mile north of lake ontario. at this time i noticed two white balls of light between us and the jet,that gave some perspective,flying from west to east. i pointed it out to lorainne and andrew and the three of us watched the two craft make aerial maneuvres like they were two dogs chasing one another in a playful manner. at first sight they could not have been much higher than half a mile because they were between us and the 747 and slightly lower. if the pilots were looking east,they had to see them. it was like two people with laser pens casting the beams on a wall chasing each other. no man made aircraft that i know of can turn and climb like that. my father was in the rcaf , helped build the five arrows and ended his working career building and then inspecting guidance systems for cruise missles so i have had decent exposure to the aircraft industry and i would bet the farm that an intelligent life source was influencing the flight path of these two vehicles.They flew almost entirely from west to east with the exception of the circular like loopdy-loo flight paths. they ended up being east of us when they stopped travelling horizontally and went vertical climbing higher. they both seemed to pick a spot near each other, climb higher then dim from single bright white lights to three, dimmer, blue lights in an equidistant triangular pattern. that is to say that the both of them seemed to stop travelling east and went up and both turned into their own triangle. the three lights that comprised each craft were blue and kept dimming until they could no longer be seen. the funny thing was that all three of us said   hey, that looks like a couple of alien spacecraft. nobody freaked out and it is only now, roughly five years later, that i felt compelled to add our experience to the mufon files. we saw something not of this earth.
content.summary: I and 2 friends talking in yard noticed klm747 gaining alt. going s.Over l.Ontario. saw two lights between jet and us at end event ascended and turned from1 white ball to 3blue triangle equadistant lights dimmer.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 31st at 2:45-3am i was driving on interstate 5 in vancouver wa, when i slammed on my brakes right before the overpass that says padden parkway (there is no actual exit right there, i think the closest exit is the 99th st exit or 78th)the overpass was about 4 car lengths from my car. i slammed on my brakes because i saw a being hovering about 5ft above the ground in the middle of the freeway of the fast lane (i think it was in the process of crossing the freeway). it was about 1 and half car lengths in front of me, it was staring straight at me and all i could feel from it was extreme fear. the being was translucent in appearance, about 7ft tall, it had long lanky limbs. it did not appear to be clothed yet did not look naked as it was reflecting everything around it like you could see through it but it still obviously had a definite form. it had a human like form except that it had two semi long flaps of skin/hair (was hard to distinguish due to its translucence appearance) that was attached the the head (from it's profile it looked like it had slicked it's hair/flaps back, the head was smooth and graduated into those two flaps by the nape of it's neck. they were about 6 inches long.
 then it faced east and took off running. however, it did not run like a human being or any animal i've seen. it ran with it's whole body contorting/bending in half in a repetitive motion fast while hovering, it did this extremely fast leaving sort of a trail or impression of itself across the freeway, it ran across the median to the other side and into the bushes on the other side of the northbound freeway where on on ramp meets the i5.
 the whole time i stayed idling in my lane on the freeway. from the time i saw it and slammed on my brakes to the time in took off running across the freeway everything was in extreme slow motion, like time was altered. it felt like the whole event took 10 min but in reality the clock had only changed a min at most. 

i was the only car on the road, it was foggy but the area where the entity was the area had no fog and the street light gave a golden orange glow to everything, the entity seemed to absorb this light. the being did not seem to have defined features. 
then i drove on freaked out!
content.summary: Entity/alien ran across in front of my car on the highway

content.detailedDescription:
I was setting up my telescope in the darkness of my room to take a look at the moon from my bedroom window. at around 8:52 or 8:53pm, i spotted something come out into my view from behind some trees near my neighbor's house.

the object/craft appeared to be spheroid in form and wobbled and flashed red, yellow and orange lights erratically as it flew from the south-west from where it appeared, to a west/north-westerly direction.

its flight path took it over the neighborhood behind my house, flying over many trees and houses, i lost sight of it after about 2-3 minutes of watching it.

i realized it couldn't have been an earth craft due to how it wobbled and flashed it's lights in such a way that held no pattern.
content.summary: Wobbling spheroid ufo spotted from bedroom window moving west/north west, while stargazing.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home. i live on a street that curves and follows the flow of the river which runs behind my home. as i approached my driveway i saw through the trees what i first thought was the reflection of a street light. as i looked at it moving towards me it looked red and glowing i thought it was an airplane headed to the airport. then i noticed that it looked like something on fire. i thought omg it is a plane on fire. it was moving too slowly to be a plane and it made no sound. i could hear no noise as it approached and i ruled out the posibility of a helicopter. it seemed to travel in the direction of downtown norfolk. it then curved slowly to the right. it looked as if it was burning brighter. i got out of my car as so i could get a better view. i then looked back in my car to see if my cell phone was there. it was not. a car was approaching so i waved my arms to them to stop.  the car was driven by an old lady and she seemed frightened by my arm waving. i asked her to please look behind her at the object. i said over there quickly. she looked at it and said "is it an airplane"? i said no but it looks to be on fire. at that point it moved slightly to our right and then slowly disappeared from sight. was asked if it could be a fireworks. absolutely noti do not know what i saw but it was not a plane or a copter. i know that what i saw was something that i could not explain and something i had never seen. it was not an airplane or a copter. i called our local news station to see if anyone had reported it. what i saw was something that made no noise,moved slower than aircraft and appered to be on fire. it was a ufo of some type. people has to see it from the norfolk- virginia beach expressway as it passed very close to that road approaching downtown norfolk.
content.summary: what appeared to be a large burning object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep and woke up in the middle of the night frozen. could not move. then the horrible fear and panic set in. i kept trying to move and i couldn't. my mind kept screaming "they're coming... they're coming..." but i didn't see anything. no liht, no craft, no beings. i've never had this happen to me before and i've never had "night terrors". i'm actually quite fond of the night. i don't have proof, but i have a strong feeling i was taken.
content.summary: Possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright big red ufo in the sky it floated down a little then side ways then disappeared then reappeared about 100 ft higher.I ran in to get a camera and ran back out and nothing was there. it made me feel sick and weird.
content.summary: Red light in sky dissappeared then reappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with friends and i saw a square object as i looked up. the object had one orange light on each corner that were very bright but not blinking. in-between each orange light was a white light. the white lights were blinking, but not as bright as the orange lights. the really strange thing was that one of the flat sides were pointing forward, not a corner.
content.summary: Square object with orange and white lights

content.detailedDescription:
I left the mcdonalds at guilford college road at piedmont parkway.  i was driving north on piedmont parkway towards wendover avenue.  i looked at the clock in my car and it said 1:59 and it was afternoon.  as i drove north i saw a large passenger jet that had taken off from the greensboro airport.  as watched the jet i saw farther off behind it another flying object.  the jet was traveling south west(ish) and climbing.  the object behind it was higher and farther away and appeared to be a disc shaped craft.  the disc shaped craft was traveling due west, flat and level.  the jet crossed in front of the disc from my perspective.  the disc was traveling slow, slower than the jet.  part of this has to do with relative distance but, i believe that the disc was, in fact, traveling slower than the jet.  i began to think that the disc was just another jet appearing to be a disk due to distance and angle.  then the disc sped back over the path that it had just come down and a very high rate of speed and was gone in an instant.

when i saw this i was shocked.  even though i had seen it as a disc shaped object i didn't expect it to actually do anything unexpected and out of character with a normal flight behavior.  when i say it went back from the way it came i mean that it was like a whip action.  it was cruising along and then in the blink of an eye went back the direction from which it had come and was gone.

the jet was probably a mile or more away as i watched it.  at the time i was just watching it and trying to figure out what airline it was from the paint scheme (never did figure that out).  the disc object was quite a bit farther behind the jet, maybe another mile away.  it was about the size of an aspirin held at arms length.  if it had not changed directions and sped away so fast i suspect that i would have ignored it.
content.summary: Saw disk change direction sped off

content.detailedDescription: I was approaching a light on 44th and 200th st to make a left turn in lynnwood wa on 2/6/14 fairly close to 2pm was running late for an appointment so was highly aware of exact time ... when i looked up to the right and saw the biggest jet .. i realize the dreamliner is huge but this thing was so low and just hovering in the sky ... i looked around to see if others were noticing .. i looked back up and within 30 seconds the craft sort of digitized around the edges ... a blinking of sorts then it took off fairly quickly ... toward the airport path.  it seems to me this was a cloaking type of craft -- best way not to be observed is to look like a jet airliner.  ?  i also recently noticed a bright light in the night sky around my home ... could have been a planet ? i stopped my car got out and took pics. it was in the sw i guess i need to learn more astronomy! but i did a quick search and found others seen the same light happening in late oct.
content.summary: Very large jet like looking craft hovering over intersection very close then digitized
